body.p:
Hd. Qrs. 8th Mich Cav. Vols.
Nicholasville Ky. May 24th 1864
To his Excellency
the Governor of the State of Kentucky

We the undersigned Officers, and Soldiers of the 8th Regt. Mich Cav. Vols. do petition Your Excellency to pardon one Truman Hartwell of Co "D" 8th Regt Mich Cav. Vols. Imprisoned for theft during the month of Sept 1863. Sentenced for two (2) years, in the Kentucky State's Prison.

We the undersigned Officers, and Soldiers in offering this petition, do so on account of his extreme youth, the bad influence he was under at that time, his previous good conduct, and general good bearing as a Soldier.
Hoping that your Excellency will grant our petition we are subscribed

Elisha Mix Lt Col Comdg 8th Mich. Cav
